title: Author Ocean Vuong | Trump Almost Started a War with Iran: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump creating a bunch of problems and then turning around and pretending he “solved” those problems.

Then, Ocean Vuong talks about writing his book in his closet, basing his fictional characters on his own experience and his mother’s response to his novel.

He also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
